ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.description:
C++ Port of the TurboReg/StackReg ImageJ Plugin.
Original code by Philippe Thevenaz (see below).
Porting by Gregor Lichtner.

This work is based on the following paper:

P. Thevenaz, U.E. Ruttimann, M. Unser
A Pyramid Approach to Subpixel Registration Based on Intensity
IEEE Transactions on Image Processing
vol. 7, no. 1, pp. 27-41, January 1998.

This paper is available on-line at
http://bigwww.epfl.ch/publications/thevenaz9801.html

Other relevant on-line publications are available at
http://bigwww.epfl.ch/publications/
about.summary: Python implementation of the ImageJ/FIJI Plugin TurboReg/StackReg

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pystackreg" %}
{% set version = "0.2.8" %}
{% set sha256 = "fb615e9fb791298a196f7468cf0d2db1d5a008cde58d74c71afc2acb6a092dfc" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 3
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - numpy                                  # [build_platform != target_platform]
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
    - python
    - numpy
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - tqdm

test:
  imports:
    - pystackreg

about:
  home: https://github.com/glichtner/pystackreg
  license: LicenseRef-TurboReg-StackReg
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Python implementation of the ImageJ/FIJI Plugin TurboReg/StackReg
  description: |
    C++ Port of the TurboReg/StackReg ImageJ Plugin.
    Original code by Philippe Thevenaz (see below).
    Porting by Gregor Lichtner.

    This work is based on the following paper:

    P. Thevenaz, U.E. Ruttimann, M. Unser
    A Pyramid Approach to Subpixel Registration Based on Intensity
    IEEE Transactions on Image Processing
    vol. 7, no. 1, pp. 27-41, January 1998.

    This paper is available on-line at
    http://bigwww.epfl.ch/publications/thevenaz9801.html

    Other relevant on-line publications are available at
    http://bigwww.epfl.ch/publications/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - glichtner
    - mrakitin

about.description:
C++ Port of the TurboReg/StackReg ImageJ Plugin.

vol. 7, no. 1, pp. 27-41, January 1998.

This paper is available on-line at
http://bigwww.epfl.ch/publications/thevenaz9801.html

about.summary: Python implementation of the ImageJ/FIJI Plugin TurboReg/StackReg
